00273    /* 
00274    * Shift Vector r to periodic cell, R[axis] < r[axis] < maxima_[axis].
00275    */
00276    inline void OrthorhombicBoundary::shift(Vector& r) const
00277    {
00278       for (int i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00279          if( r[i] >= maxima_[i] ) {
00280             r[i] = r[i] - lengths_[i];
00281             assert(r[i] < maxima_[i]);
00282          } else
00283          if ( r[i] <  minima_[i] ) {
00284             r[i] = r[i] + lengths_[i];
00285             assert(r[i] >= minima_[i]);
00286          }
00287       }
00288    }
00289 
00290    /* 
00291    * Shift Vector r to periodic cell, R[axis] < r[axis] < maxima_[axis].
00292    */
00293    inline void OrthorhombicBoundary::shift(Vector& r, IntVector& shift) const
00294    {
00295       for (int i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00296          if (r[i] >= maxima_[i]) {
00297             r[i] = r[i] - lengths_[i];
00298             ++(shift[i]);
00299             assert(r[i] < maxima_[i]);
00300          } else
00301          if (r[i] <  minima_[i]) {
00302             r[i] = r[i] + lengths_[i];
00303             --(shift[i]);
00304             assert(r[i] >= minima_[i]);
00305          }
00306       }
00307    }
00308 
00309    /* 
00310    * Calculate squared distance by minimum image convention.
00311    */
00312    inline 
00313    double OrthorhombicBoundary::distanceSq(const Vector &r1, const Vector &r2, 
00314                                IntVector& translate) const
00315    {
00316       double dr;
00317       double norm = 0.0;
00318       for (int i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00319          dr = r1[i] - r2[i];
00320          if ( fabs(dr) > halfLengths_[i] ) {
00321             if (dr > 0.0) {
00322                dr -= lengths_[i];
00323                translate[i] = -1;
00324             } else {
00325                dr += lengths_[i];
00326                translate[i] = +1;
00327             }
00328             assert(fabs(dr) <= halfLengths_[i]);
00329          } else {
00330             translate[i] = 0;
00331          }
00332          norm += dr*dr;
00333       }
00334       return norm;
00335    }
00336 
00337    /* 
00338    * Return squared distance and separation with minimum image convention.
00339    */
00340    inline 
00341    double OrthorhombicBoundary::distanceSq(const Vector &r1, const Vector &r2) const
00342    {
00343       double dr;
00344       double norm = 0.0;
00345       for (int i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00346          dr = r1[i] - r2[i];
00347          if ( fabs(dr) > halfLengths_[i] ) {
00348             if ( dr > 0.0 ) {
00349                dr -= lengths_[i];
00350             } else {
00351                dr += lengths_[i];
00352             }
00353             assert(fabs(dr) <= halfLengths_[i]);
00354          }
00355          norm += dr*dr;
00356       }
00357       return norm;
00358    }
00359 
00360    /* 
00361    * Calculate squared distance between two positions, and separation vector,
00362    * using the minimum image convention.
00363    */
00364    inline 
00365    double OrthorhombicBoundary::distanceSq(const Vector &r1, const Vector &r2, 
00366                                           Vector &dr) const
00367    {
00368       for (int i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00369          dr[i] = r1[i] - r2[i];
00370          if (fabs(dr[i]) > halfLengths_[i]) {
00371             if (dr[i] > 0.0) {
00372                dr[i] -= lengths_[i];
00373             } else {
00374                dr[i] += lengths_[i];
00375             }
00376             assert(fabs(dr[i]) <= halfLengths_[i]);
00377          }
00378       }
00379       return ( dr[0]*dr[0] + dr[1]*dr[1] + dr[2]*dr[2] );
00380    }
